ethical_question: You see a homeless person sleeping on the ground in front of your business. Should you call the police to pick them up or just tell them to leave?

tag_descriptions.Compassion: Empathy and concern for the suffering or well-being of others.
tag_descriptions.Nonviolence: Rejecting physical harm to others or self.
tag_descriptions.Respect: Treating all beings with dignity and consideration.
tag_descriptions.Dignity: Respect for inherent worth and autonomy of all individuals.
